name: Dead In Vinland
description: DEAD IN VINLAND is a survival/management game, mixed with RPG and adventure elements, about a Viking family trying their best to survive on a mysterious island.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 SP1 Processor: AMD Athlon II X4 640 3.0GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720 minimal screen resolution
